item.description:
Join us to practice, learn new salsa skills, and meet other salsa-lovers! It's the perfect way to spend a Sunday afternoon!

30-50 dancers of all levels attend our meet-up each week to socialize, practice, learn from and teach each other. There is no organized instruction, but instructors are always available to answer questions, give tips and dance with you! Everyone is friendly and welcoming, so please come ready to ask people to dance.

And for those of you who DO want a structured class, we now offer a terrific Salsa Technique class right before the meet-up, so you have new things to practice all afternoon!

Salsa Sunday Schedule:
4:00-5:00 Salsa Technique Class (For Beginner & Advanced Beginner Dancers)
5:00-6:30 Open Practice and Social Dancing

NEW POLICIES! For building licensing reasons, we are no longer allowed to have our classes or practices at the YWCA open to the general public...but you are NOT the general public, you are a Meet-up Group Member! So, you have two options:
1) you can now pay for the meet-up or the class by PayPal below, and bring your receipt. This will show you are a member and that you have paid.
2) you can purchase a card of 5 practices, 5 classes or 5 of each. These cards will be offered to Meet-up Group and MetaMovements members only, and each member buying a set of 5 will receive a discount off the regular price. At this point in time, cards must be purchased in cash at any Meet-up Group or MetaMovements event.

Prices:
Class: $15
Meet-up & Practice: $5
And you can join us at Ryles anytime from 7-midnight (just $7 with the meet-up discount!)

To get more more information about these (or any) of our classes, training programs or performance team, please feel free to contact me or visit www.metamovements.com

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: NEW POLICY for Salsa Sundays Meet-up!
